name: As Long As It's Not Illegal- Extendo Demo
name_original: As Long As It's Not Illegal- Extendo Demo
description:
If you like the game, rate and Comment⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ It brings me sustenance! It's Friday night, you and the other Senior Elites devise a plan to throw a party on the enemy campus. Carpool across Suncity limits, down into the lawless land of the Undercity.  It's Illegal for these two cities to mingle.  But is it illegal if... you're never caught?

Roxanne: You play as Roxanne (nameable), however, the story will sometimes shift into the eyes of the love interests and other characters to tell the story.

The story branches down 5 different endings, there are even choices in-game that will affect your clothing. 

Animation: There is subtle movement within the environments you visit throughout the story to bring a bit of life into every scene. 

A full gallery of beautiful art, depicting specific points in the story.

Clothes: There are a lota fits in this game, looota fits. I believe the love interest each have at least 3 outfit changes or more, and Roxanne has seven SEVEN!

Possible Trigger warnings: Suggested suicide, Self-harm, Partial nudity, Drugs, Crude humor, Strong language & depictions of violence... blood?! The full game is Available for Early Access on PATREON!

ACT I-Public Release: October 15, 2022
